Board.name: fifteen
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: The fifteen game
Board.description: Move each item to make an increasing series: from the smallest to the largest
Board.manual: Click on any item that has a free block beside it, and it will be swapped with the empty block.
Board.credit: Original code taken from the libgnomecanvas demo
